dialog.text: Teller: The top two thirds is filled with clouds and the bottom third (slightly more than a third) is grass.
Yes. What is the weather like?
Not super sunny, a little bit cloudy
Got it. Is there anything on the grass?
There is a lake under the grass, and some trees in the center of the screen and above the grass
How high up does the lake go? Does it cover all the way from left to right?
the lake covers from left to right, and it goes up one fourth of the screen from the bottom
There is a fence starts from one third from the bottom on the grass, and it covers from left to right about one fourth on the screen
Does it go all the way from left to right?
It goes about one fourth of the screen from left to right
There is a sky in the top right corner, starts from one fourth from top and one third from right
Got it. We should be good.
